description:
From our law office in Chicago, Illinois, the dedicated legal professionals at Deratany & Kosner provide invaluable counsel and support to clients across the greater Chicago metro region and surrounding areas who are dealing with complex and pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home negligence
• Foster care abuse and negligence
• Adoption abuse and negligence
• Personal injury

Backed by our more than 100 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently while increasing your chances of achieving the justice you deserve. To date, we have recovered more than $400 million in settlements and verdicts on behalf of our plaintiff clients, and you can rely on us to fight aggressively to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation you need during this difficult and uncertain time in your life.

Honored for our success as well as our outstanding professionalism and service, our lawyers have earned Leading Lawyers designation as well as top rankings from the National Trial Lawyers and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America. Moreover, we have earned recognition as having secured some of the largest verdicts for medical malpractice and personal injury claims, and we have received votes as being one of Illinois' top injury law firm for the past 13 years.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of advocacy for your legal issue. You can begin the process of securing the help and support you need by contacting Deratany & Kosner and scheduling a free case evaluation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these trying times.
